metadata.title: CVE-2017-12872 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
The (1) Htpasswd authentication source in the authcrypt module and (2)SimpleSAML_Session class in SimpleSAMLphp 1.14.11 and earlier allow remoteattackers to conduct timing side-channel attacks by leveraging use of thestandard comparison operator to compare secret material against user input.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-12872` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

simplesamlphp - 1.14.15-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: simplesamlphp package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.14.15-1').
